CustomField.description: Determines if both material and cash is being issued in the settlement
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Default', TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Goodwill' ), OR( Actual_Labour_Settlement__c > 0, AND( ISBLANK(Actual_Labour_Settlement__c), OR (Suggested_Labour_Settlement__c > 0, Settlement_Amount__c > 0) ) ), OR( Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c > 0, AND( ISBLANK(Num_of_Bundles_for_Settlement__c ), Suggested_Bundles_for_Settlement__c > 0 ) ) ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Is Cheque And Material?
